column4: Someone I need some assistance.. my ubuntu vps won't accept incommming connections to any ports and with a netstat I can see that the ports I need have TIME_WAIT how do I fix this
Is someone going to help me..
WOULD ANYONE LIKE TO HELP ME
then wait longer, 5 mins is nothing at all
Its simple port issue I can't figure out
is the server on some hosted service out on the web?
The ports are still refusing connections
